name: Jiyan
description: Jiyan, leader of the Midnight Rangers, acts with swift and resolute righteousness. He possesses the formidable ability to conjure a powerful Qingloong from the winds, making him invincible on the battlefield.

details.Basic Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive thrusts, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Consume STA to perform a powerful thrust, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Windborne Strike: Hold Basic Attack during Heavy Attack to cast Windborne Strike after the Heavy Attack ends, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Abyssal Slash: Release the Basic Attack during Heavy Attack to cast Abyssal Slash after the Heavy Attack ends, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consume STA to perform a plunging attack from mid-air, dealing Aero DMG; follow up with Basic Attack to continue the sequence, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Banner of Triumph: After Windborne Strike or using Resonance Skill Windqueller in the air, perform an aerial attack dealing Aero DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to strike, dealing Aero DMG.

details.Windqueller: Dash forward a certain distance, dealing Aero DMG. Can be cast in mid-air.

details.Prelude: After release, enter Qingloong Mode (enhanced anti-interruption). Basic/Heavy/Dodge Counter are replaced with Heavy Attack: Lance of Qingloong.
details.Heavy Attack: Lance of Qingloong: Perform up to 3 continuous lunges, dealing Aero DMG (considered Heavy Attack DMG).

details.Windqueller Enhancement: If Jiyan has 30 or more Resolve when casting Windqueller, consume 30 Resolve to increase its DMG by 20%. In Qingloong Mode, Windqueller’s DMG is further increased by 20% and no longer consumes Resolve.
details.Emerald Storm: Finale: When casting Emerald Storm: Prelude, if Jiyan has 30 or more Resolve, consume 30 Resolve to cast Emerald Storm: Finale, dealing Aero DMG (considered Heavy Attack DMG). Emerald Storm: Finale can be cast in mid-air at low altitude.
details.Resolve: Max 60. Gain Resolve when Normal Attack Lone Lance hits a target or when Intro Skill Tactical Strike hits. If Jiyan does not hit a target within 15s, Resolve gradually decreases.

inherent_skill1.name: Heavenly Balance
inherent_skill1.description: After casting Intro Skill Tactical Strike, ATK +10% for 15s.

inherent_skill2.name: Tempest Taming
inherent_skill2.description: When attacks hit a target, Crit. DMG +12% for 8s.

intro_skill.name: Tactical Strike
intro_skill.description: Stab the target from the air, dealing Aero DMG.

outro_skill.name: Discipline
outro_skill.description: When the next character’s Heavy Attack (or a nearby team’s character that activates an Outro Skill) hits the target, Jiyan summons Qingloong to launch a Coordinated Attack, dealing Aero DMG equal to 313.40% of Jiyan’s ATK. Lasts 8s, can trigger once every 1s, up to 2 times.

resonance_chain.s1: Windqueller can be used 1 more time. When casting Windqueller, Resolve cost −15.
resonance_chain.s2: After casting Intro Skill Tactical Strike, gain 30 Resolve and ATK +28% for 15s (once every 15s).
resonance_chain.s3: When casting Windqueller, Emerald Storm: Prelude, Emerald Storm: Finale, or Intro Skill Tactical Strike, Crit. Rate +16% and Crit. DMG +32% for 8s.
resonance_chain.s4: When casting Emerald Storm: Prelude or Emerald Storm: Finale, Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all team members +25% for 30s.
resonance_chain.s5: Outro Skill Discipline DMG Multiplier +120%. When Jiyan’s attacks hit a target, ATK +3% for 8s, stacking up to 15 times (instantly maxed after casting Intro Skill Tactical Strike).
resonance_chain.s6: Every Heavy Attack, Intro Skill Tactical Strike, or Windqueller grants 1 stack of Momentum (max 2). Emerald Storm: Finale consumes all Momentum; each stack consumed increases Finale’s DMG Multiplier by 120%.
